title: Shifting Ideologies of Gender and Sexuality in Science
description: Explore how contemporary understandings of gender and sexuality have been influenced by research in science and medicine and how preconceptions about gender and sexuality influence research. How are discrepancies between what scientists assume about gender and sexual difference reconciled with evidence to the contrary? How have ideas changed over time? Topics range from sex differences in health outcomes, intersexuality, neuroplasticity, environmental exposure, and sports medicine. Prerequisites: upper-division standing.
